title: Itinera — Smart Itinerary Planner for Travelers who want more
description: A mobile app that generates personalized travel itineraries based on user preferences and curated local experiences.
long_description: Itinera is a personalized travel itinerary planner designed for experiential tourism. Travelers select their preferred city and activities, and the system generates a dynamic itinerary based on curated experiences uploaded by creators. The app aims to simplify travel planning while promoting authentic local experiences.

title: Riderly — Motorcycle Rental System
description: A full-stack motorcycle rental platform with booking, business dashboards, subscription plans, and secure payment workflows.
long_description: Riderly is a motorcycle rental web application that enables customers to browse, book, and pay for rentals while business owners manage listings, bookings, and subscriptions. Built using React for the frontend and Express + MySQL for backend operations.

title: Portfolio Website (SPA)
description: A minimalist single-page portfolio that highlights projects, skills, and experience with smooth navigation.
long_description: A clean and modern personal portfolio built with React and Vite. Features a hero section, about section, recent works, and a dedicated project details page using React Router.
